'A bag belt only?', he asked his balding.solution: Talk to Abbot Langley in the monastery near Edgeville.

'See you in your dreams' said the vegeta.solution: Speak to Dominic Onion at the Nightmare Zone teleport spot.

'Small shoe.' Often found with rod on mu.solution: Talk to any Gnome trainer in the Agility area of the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

2 musical birds. Dig in front of the spi.solution: Dig in front of the spinning light in Ping and Pong's room inside the Iceberg. A clockwork suit is required to enter the iceberg.

46 is my number. My body is the colour o.solution: Dig on top of the sapphire spawn in the Spiders' nest in level 46 Wilderness (north-west of Lava Dragon Isle).

A chisel and hammer reside in his home,.solution: Wizard Cromperty at the north-east corner of East Ardougne. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to at least +100 in magical attack bonus.

A crate found in the tower of a church i.solution: Climb the ladder and search the crates on the first floor in the church in East Ardougne.

A demon's best friend holds the next ste.solution: Kill a hellhound.Note: Killing Cerberus or hellhounds inside the God Wars Dungeon does not count.

A dwarf, approaching death, but very muc.solution: Thorgel at the entrance to the Death altar. Requires partial completion of Mourning's Ends Part II.

A great view - watch the rapidly drying.solution: Almera's house north of Baxtorian Falls, search the boxes on the 2nd floor.

A Guthixian ring lies between two peaks..solution: Search the stones several steps west of the Guthixian stone circle in Taverley, search the stones.

A massive battle rages beneath so be car.solution: North-east of the God Wars Dungeon entrance, climb the rocky handholds and dig by the large crossbow.

A reck you say; let's pray there aren't.solution: Speak to Father Aereck in Lumbridge.

A ring of water surrounds 4 powerful rin.solution: Dig by the ladder leading to the Dagannoth Kings' room in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

A town with a different sort of night-li.solution: Search the crate inside of the clothes shop in Canifis.

Aggie I see, Lonely and southern I feel.solution: Dig outside the window of Aggie the Witch's house in Draynor Village.

AIQ 0440.solution: Dig 4 steps east and 4 steps south of the center of the fairy ring (Mudskipper Point).

AIR 2331.solution: Dig 2 steps east and 1 step south of the center of the fairy ring.

ALP 1140.solution: Dig 1 step east and 3 steps south of the center of the fairy ring by the Lighthouse.

And so on, and so on, and so on. Walking.solution: Dig on Etceteria next to the evergreen tree in front of the castle walls.

Anger Abbot Langley..solution: Speak to Abbot Langley while you have a negative prayer bonus (currently only possible with an Ancient staff).

Anger those who adhere to Saradomin's ed.solution: Port Sarim docks, try to charter a ship to Entrana with armour or weapons equipped.

Belladonna, my dear. If only I had glove.solution: Talk to the Tool leprechaun at Belladonna farming patch at Draynor Manor.

Between where the best are commemorated.solution: Dig at the Clan Cup Trophy at Clan Wars.

BIP 7013.solution: Dig 6 steps north and 3 steps west of the center of the fairy ring (Fairytale II - Cure a Queen or 50 Agility required).

BJR 1123.solution: Dig 1 steps south and 2 steps west of the center of the fairy ring. Partial completion of the Holy Grail quest is required to enter this area.

BLP 6200.solution: Dig 6 steps north and 2 steps east of the center of the fairy ring.

Buried beneath the ground, who knows whe.solution: Speak to Jorral to receive a strange device, which works similarly to the enchanted key (must have Making History quest completed).

CIS 0009.solution: Dig 9 steps west of the center of the fairy ring CIS. (You can also use Skills necklace to teleport to the Woodcutting Guild and run north), (or use games necklace to teleport to Wintertodt camp and walk south.)

Citric cellar..solution: Speak to Heckel Funch on the 2nd floor in the Grand Tree.

CKP 0224.solution: Dig 2 steps south and 2 steps west of the center of the fairy ring CKP.

Come brave adventurer, your sense is on.solution: Speak to Viggora. He can be found in three locations, but players can only make progress by speaking to him in the location he was spoken to during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. He can be found at one of the following locations:

Come have a cip with this great soot cov.solution: Talk to Miner Magnus east of the fairy ring CIP. Answer: 8

Come to the evil ledge, Yew know yew wan.solution: Dig in Edgeville, just east of the southern yew tree.

Covered in shadows, the centre of the ci.solution: Dig in the centre of Mort'ton, where the roads intersect. Just south of Razmire Keelgan.

Darkness wanders around me, but fills my.solution: Speak to Biblia on the Arceuus Library's top floor.

Desert insects is what I see, Taking car.solution: Dig next to the entomologist, in the Kalphite Cave east of Shantay Pass.

Dig between some ominous stones in Falad.solution: Three standing stones inside a walled area. East of the northern Falador gate.

Dig in front of the icy arena where 1 of.solution: Where you fought Kamil from Desert Treasure, dig north east of the first small rock just past the wolves.

Dig in the centre of a great kingdom of.solution: Dig in front of the large statue in the centre of Great Kourend.

Dig near some giant mushrooms behind the.solution: Dig near the red mushrooms north-west of the Grand Tree.

Dig under Ithoi's cabin..solution: Dig under Ithoi the Navigator's cabin. Players must have started The Corsair Curse quest in order to reach the Corsair Cove.

Dig under Razorlor's toad batta..solution: Dig on the toad batta spawn in Tarn's Lair.

Dig where 4 siblings and I all live with.solution: Dig in the chicken pen inside the Champions' Guild. Requires 32 quest points to enter.

Dig where the forces of Zamorak and Sara.solution: Dig next to the law rift in the Abyss, in the north-east section.

DIP 8511.solution: Dig 7 steps north and 4 steps east of the center of the fairy ring.

DKS 2310.solution: Dig 1 step north and 3 steps east of the center of the fairy ring (north east of Rellekka).

Dobson is my last name, and with gardeni.solution: Horacio, located in the garden of the Handelmort Mansion in East Ardougne.

Does one really need a fire to stay warm.solution: Located next to the fire near the Volcanic Mine entrance on the Fossil Island Volcano.

Even the seers say this clue goes right.solution: Search the crate on the Seers' Village Agility Course. Requires 60 Agility (can be boosted from 55 with a Summer pie).

Faint sounds of 'Arr', fire giants found.solution: Dig south of the pillar at the end of the Deep Wilderness Dungeon.

Falo the bard wants to see you..solution: Speak to Falo the Bard, who is located on the road to the Fremennik Province.

Fiendish cooks probably won't dig the di.solution: Dig by the fire in the Rogues' Den.

Find a crate close to the monks that lik.solution: The crate is in the east side of the Kandarin Monastery, which is south of Ardougne and where Brother Omad is found.

Four blades I have, yet draw no blood; S.solution: Lumbridge windmill, search the crates on the top floor.

Generally speaking, his nose was very be.solution: Talk to General Bentnoze, found in the topmost part of Goblin Village; he'll give you a puzzle box.

Ghommal wishes to be impressed by how st.solution: Speak to Ghommal with a total Melee Strength bonus of over 100. (Note: Amulet of strength gives +10, even better than a fury for this clue.)

Ghostly bones..solution: Kill an Ankou, which can be found on the 4th level of Stronghold of Security, the Stronghold Slayer Cave, the Catacombs of Kourend, and The Forgotten Cemetery.

Go to the village being attacked by trol.solution: Go to Dunstan's house in the north-east corner of Burthorpe. Kill Penda in the Toad and Chicken to obtain the key.

Go to this building to be illuminated, a.solution: The 2nd floor of the Lighthouse (fairy ring code ALP). Kill a Rellekka Market Guard to obtain the key. (NOTE: Starting the Horror from the Deep quest and speaking to Gunnjorn to obtain the Lighthouse key is required! Level 35 Agility is required to talk to Gunnjorn. You must also repair the bridge with two wooden planks, a hammer and 60 steel nails.)

Gold I see, yet gold I require. Give me.solution: Speak to Saniboch at the Brimhaven Dungeon entrance.

Great demons, dragons, and spiders prote.solution: Dig by the runite rock in the Lava Maze Dungeon.

Green is the colour of my death as the w.solution: Required: Sled, partial completion of Troll Romance. Players need to slide down to where Trollweiss grows on Trollweiss Mountain.

Guthix left his mark in a fiery lake, di.solution: Dig at the tip of the lava lake that is shaped like a Guthixian symbol, west of the Mage Arena.

He knows just how easy it is to lose tra.solution: Speak to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower. Answer: 22.

Here, there are tears, but nobody is cry.solution: Talk to Juna while wearing three Guthix related items. Known working items include: Guthix armour, Void Knight equipment, Book of Balance, Guthix Staff, Guthix cape, and Guthix mjolnir.

His bark is worse than his bite..solution: Speak to Barker at Canifis's Barkers' Haberdashery.

His head might be hollow, but the crates.solution: Search the crates near the Clay golem in the ruins of Uzer.

Hopefully this set of armour will help y.solution: Speak to Sir Vyvin while wearing white white platebodyplatebody, and white platelegsplatelegs.

I am a token of the greatest love. I hav.solution: Dig by the gate in the basement of the West Varrock bank.

I am the one who watches the giants. The.solution: Speak to Kamfreena on the top floor of the Warriors' Guild.

I burn between heroes and legends..solution: Speak to the candle maker in Catherby.

I have many arms but legs, I have just o.solution: Spirit tree in Tree Gnome Village (location)Tree Gnome Village. Answer: 13112221

I lie beneath the first descent to the h.solution: Dig immediately after climbing down the first set of rocks towards Saradomin's Encampment within the God Wars Dungeon. Two ropes are needed; one to enter the dungeon and another to enter Saradomin's Encampment (not required if you've used once before already). 70 Agility is also required (cannot be boosted).

I lie lonely and forgotten in mid wilder.solution: Directly under the crossbow respawn in the Graveyard of Shadows in level 18 Wilderness.

I live in a deserted crack collecting so.solution: Enter the crack west of Nardah rug merchant, and talk to the Genie. A rope and a light source are required (Spirits of the Elid required).

I watch the sea. I watch you fish. I wat.solution: Speak to Ellena at Catherby fruit tree patch.

I wonder how many bronze swords he has h.solution: Talk to Vannaka. He can be found in Edgeville Dungeon.

I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs..solution: Talk to Father Jean in the Hosidius church.

Identify the back of this over-acting br.solution: Talk to Hamid, the monk at the altar in the Duel Arena. You will receive a puzzle box.

If a man carried my burden, he would bre.solution: Speak to Gerrant in the Gerrant's Fishy Businessfish shop in Port Sarim.

If you look closely enough, it seems tha.solution: Search the haystack by the south corner of the Rangers' Guild. You need level 40 Ranged to access it.

If you're feeling brave, dig beneath the.solution: Dig below the mossy rock under the Viyeldi caves. Requires progress or completion of Legends' Quest. Items needed: Pickaxe, unpowered orb, lockpick (multiple recommended), a rope, a spade, and any Charge Orb spell. A bravery potion is also required if the quest is not completed (You also need any Axe and a Machete to get through the jungle).

In a town where everyone has perfect vis.solution: The drawers is in Seers' Village in the house south of the Elemental Workshop entrance. Kill any chicken to obtain a key. (Note: The closest chicken is just by the entrance of the Ranging Guild, west of Seers' Village.)

In a town where the guards are armed wit.solution: Search the drawers in the pub north of Ardougne Castle. Kill a guard dog at Handelmort Mansion to obtain the key.

In a town where thieves steal from stall.solution: Kill any guard located around East Ardougne for a key. Then, search the drawers in the upstairs hallway of Jerico's house, which is the house with pigeon cages located south of the northern East Ardougne bank.

In a town where wizards are known to gat.solution: Travel to Yanille and head to the house northwest of the bank. Kill a man nearby to receive a key. Go upstairs in the house and search the chest.

In a village made of bamboo, look for so.solution: Search the crate by the house at the northern point of the broken jungle fence in Tai Bwo Wannai.

In the city where merchants are said to.solution: Talk to the head chef in Cooks' Guild west of Varrock. Remember to wear a Chef's Hat.

It seems to have reached the end of the.solution: Search the carts in the northern part of the Dwarven Mine.

Kill the spiritual, magic and godly whil.solution: Kill a spiritual mage in the God Wars Dungeon - 83 Slayer requirement.

Leader of the Yak City..solution: Talk to Mawnis Burowgar in Neitiznot. Fremennik Isles jester part required.

Look in the ground floor crates of house.solution: The house east of Falador East Bank.

Mine was the strangest birth under the s.solution: Inside Karamja Volcano, dig directly underneath the red spiders' eggs respawn.

Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make.solution: Kill a green dragon. Brutal green dragons do NOT count for this clue. Players who have completed Dragon Slayer II can use the Myths' Guild basement to kill green dragons outside the Wilderness.

Monk's residence in the far west. See ro.solution: Search the drawers upstairs in the chapel found on the southern coast of Hosidius. Directly south of the player-owned house portal.

Must be full of railings..solution: Search the boxes around the hut where the broken dwarf cannon is, close to the start of the Dwarf CannonDwarf Cannon quest (Northwest of the Fishing Guild).

My giant guardians below the market stre.solution: Dig near the cauldron by moss giants under Varrock Sewers. A slash weapon or knife is required to navigate through the sewers. Players with 51 Agility can use the shortcut pipe from Edgeville Dungeon to direct access the clue location; a slash weapon or knife is not required in this case.

My home is grey, and made of stone; A ca.solution: Open the drawers inside the room with the spinning wheel on the first floor of Lumbridge Castle.

My life was spared but these voices rema.solution: Speak to the Key Master in Cerberus' Lair.

My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt.solution: Speak to Wilough, next to the fur merchant in Varrock Square.

Often sought out by scholars of historie.solution: Speak to an examiner at the Exam Centre. You might need to talk to several different examiners.

One of several rhyming brothers, in busi.solution: Speak to Piles in the Resource Area. An entry fee of 7,500 coins is required (6,000 if the medium Wilderness Diary is completed, 3,750 if the hard diary is completed, or free if the elite diary is completed).

One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your.solution: Speak to Captain Tobias on the docks of Port Sarim.

Pentagrams and demons, burnt bones and r.solution: Dig under the blood rune spawn next to the Demonic Ruins.

Probably filled with books on magic..solution: Search the bookcase in the basement of Wizards' Tower.

Probably filled with wizards socks..solution: Kill one of the wizards for the key. Search the drawers in the basement of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor Village. (Fairy ring DIS)

Read 'How to breed scorpions.' By O.W.Th.solution: Search the northern bookcase on the 2nd floor of the Sorcerer's Tower.

Reflection is the weakness for these eye.solution: Kill a basilisk, which requires a mirror shield and 40 Slayer.

Right on the blessed border, cursed by t.solution: Dig right under the fairy ring located west of Filliman's grotto. The fairy ring code is BIP. Players without access to fairy ring transport can use the shortcut to get to the island provided they have 50 Agility.

Robin wishes to see your finest ranged e.solution: Robin at the inn in Port Phasmatys. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to 182 ranged attack bonus or over.

Rotting next to a ditch. Dig next to the.solution: Dig next to a fishing spot on the south-east side of Burgh de Rott.

Salty peter..solution: Talk to Konoo who is digging saltpetre in Hosidius.

Scattered coins and gems fill the floor..solution: Kill the King Black Dragon for a key, and then open the closed chest in the north-east corner of the lair.

Search a bookcase in the Wizards tower..solution: The bookcase located on the ground floor.

Search a crate in the Haymaker's arms..solution: Search the crate in the north-east corner of The Haymaker's Arms tavern east of the Woodcutting Guild.

Search a wardrobe in Draynor..solution: Go to Aggie's house and search the wardrobe in northern wall.

Search chests found in the upstairs of s.solution: Search the chest in the upstairs of Wydin's Food Store, on the east wall.

Search for a crate in a building in Heme.solution: House north of the Fishing Contest quest area, west of Grandpa Jack.

Search for a crate in Varrock Castle..solution: Search the crate in the corner of the kitchen in Varrock Castle.

Search for a crate on the ground floor o.solution: Search inside Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight's house, located south of the pub in Seers' Village.

Search the bookcase in the monastery..solution: Search the southeastern bookcase at Edgeville Monastery.

Search the boxes in a shop in Taverley..solution: The box inside Gaius' Two Handed Shop.

Search the boxes in one of the tents in.solution: Search the crates in the tent east of the Silk trader.

Search the boxes in the goblin house nea.solution: Goblin house on the eastern side of the river.

Search the boxes in the house near the s.solution: The first house on the left when entering the city from the southern entrance.

Search the boxes just outside the Armour.solution: Outside Zenesha's Plate Mail Body Shop.

Search the bucket in the Port Sarim jail.solution: Players can only enter the jail cell by incriminating yourself at the Shantay Pass. Talk to Shantay and identify yourself as an outlaw after asking what the place is. Once you are sent to the jail, refuse to pay the 5gp fine twice and you will be sent to the Port Sarim Jail.

Search the bush at the digsite centre..solution: The bush is on the east side of the first pathway towards the Digsite from the Exam Centre.

Search the chest in Barbarian Village..solution: The chest located in the house with a spinning wheel.

Search the chest in the Duke of Lumbridg.solution: The Duke HoracioDuke's room is on the 2nd floor in Lumbridge Castle.

Search the chest in the left-hand tower.solution: Located on the 3rd floor of the western tower of Camelot.

Search the chests in the Dwarven Mine..solution: The chest is on the western wall, where Hura's Crossbow Shop is, in the Dwarven Mine.

Search the chests upstairs in Al Kharid.solution: The chest is located in the north-east corner on the first floor.

Search the Coffin in Edgeville..solution: Search the coffin located by the Edgeville wilderness teleport lever.

Search the crate in the left-hand tower.solution: Located on the first floor of the southern tower at the Lumbridge Castle entrance.

Search the crate in the Toad and Chicken.solution: The Toad and Chicken pub is located in Burthorpe.

Search the crate near a cart in Port Kha.solution: Search by the southern Khazard General Store in Port Khazard.

Search the crates in a bank in Varrock..solution: Search in the basement of the West Varrock bank.

Search the crates in a house in Yanille.solution: The house is located north-west of the bank.

Search the crates in Canifis..solution: Search inside the shop, Rufus' Meat Emporium.

Search the crates in East Ardougne's gen.solution: Located south of the Ardougne church.

Search the crates in the Barbarian Villa.solution: Peksa's Helmet Shop in Barbarian Village.

Search the crates in the Dwarven mine..solution: Search the east of the Ice Mountain ladder entrance in the Drogo's Mining Emporium.

Search the crates in the guard house of.solution: The guard house is north-east of the Handelmort Mansion.

Search the crates in the most north-west.solution: Search the crates in the house, marked with a cooking range icon, south-east of the gem stall.

Search the crates in the outhouse of the.solution: Located in the small building attached by a fence to the main building. Climb over the stile.

Search the crates in the Port Sarim Fish.solution: Search the crates, by the door, in Gerrant's Fishy Business in Port Sarim.

Search the crates in the shed just north.solution: The crates in the shed north of the northern Ardougne bank.

Search the crates near a cart in Varrock.solution: South-east of Varrock Palace, south of the tree farming patch.

Search the drawers above Varrock's shops.solution: Located upstairs in Thessalia's Fine Clothes shop in Varrock.

Search the drawers found upstairs in Eas.solution: Upstairs of the pub north of the Ardougne Castle.

Search the drawers in a house in Draynor.solution: The drawer is located in the northernmost house in Draynor Village.

Search the drawers in Falador's chain ma.solution: Wayne's Chains - Chainmail Specialist store at the southern Falador walls.

Search the drawers in one of Gertrude's.solution: Kanel's bedroom (southeastern room), outside of west Varrock.

Search the drawers in the ground floor o.solution: Search the drawers in Yanille's hunting shop.

Search the drawers in the house next to.solution: House east of Betty's. Contains a cooking sink.

Search the drawers of houses in Burthorp.solution: Inside Hild's house in the north-east corner of Burthorpe.

Search the drawers on the first floor of.solution: Climb the ladder in the house north of the Ardougne market.

Search the drawers upstairs in Falador's.solution: Cassie's Shield Shop at the northern Falador entrance.

Search the drawers upstairs of houses in.solution: House is located east of the eastern Falador bank and south of the fountain. The house is indicated by the cooking range icon on the minimap.

Search the open crate found in a small f.solution: The house is east of the mess in Hosidius.

Search the tents in the Imperial Guard c.solution: Search in the tents in north-west corner of the camp.

Search the upstairs drawers of a house i.solution: The house in the south-east corner of Brimhaven, north-east of Davon's Amulet Store. Kill any pirate located around Brimhaven to obtain the key.

Search the wheelbarrow in Rimmington min.solution: The Rimmington mining site is located north of Rimmington.

Search through chests found in the upsta.solution: The house is located south-west of the Falador Party Room. There are two chests in the room; search the northern chest.

Search through some drawers found in Tav.solution: The south-eastern most house, south of Jatix's Herblore Shop.

Search through some drawers in the upsta.solution: On the first floor of the house north of Hetty the Witch's house in Rimmington.

Search upstairs in the houses of Seers'.solution: Located in the house with the spinning wheel. South of the Seers' Village bank.

She's small but can build both literally.solution: Speak to Lovada south of the Lovakengj blast mine.

Shhhh!.solution: Speak to Logosia in the Arceuus Library's ground floor.

Show this to Sherlock..solution: Sherlock can be found south of Seers' Village. Players will have to perform one of the Sherlock tasks in order to complete this challenge.

Snah? I feel all confused, like one of t.solution: Talk to Hans roaming around Lumbridge Castle.

Someone watching the fights in the Duel.solution: Talk to Jeed, found on the upper floors, at the Duel Arena.

South of a river in a town surrounded by.solution: Dig in front of the Shilo Village (location)Shilo Village furnace.

Speak to a referee..solution: Talk to a Gnome ball referee found on the Gnome Ball field in the Gnome Stronghold. You will receive a challenge scroll that you have to answer. Answer: 5096

Speak to a Wyse man..solution: Talk to Wyson the gardener at Falador Park.

Speak to Arhein in Catherby..solution: Arhein is just south of the Catherby bank.

Speak to Donovan, the Family Handyman..solution: Donovan the Family Handyman is found on the 2nd floor of Sinclair Mansion.

Speak to Doric, who lives north of Falad.solution: Doric is found north of Falador and east of the Taverley gate.

Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid..solution: Ellis is tanner just north of Al Kharid bank.

Speak to Gaius in Taverley..solution: Gaius is found at the north-west corner in Taverley.

Speak to Hajedy..solution: Hajedy is found by the Shilo Village cart systemcart, located just south of the Brimhaven docks.

Speak to Hans to solve the clue..solution: Hans can be found at Lumbridge Castle.

Speak to Hazelmere..solution: Hazelmere is located east of Yanille. The fairy ring code CLS will take you directly next to his house. Answer: 6859

Speak to Jatix in Taverley..solution: Jatix is found in the middle of Taverley.

Speak to Kangai Mau..solution: Kangai Mau is found in the Shrimp and Parrot in Brimhaven.

Speak to Ned in Draynor Village..solution: Ned is found north or the Draynor bank.

Speak to Roavar..solution: Talk to Roavar in the Canifis Hair of the Dogtavern.

Speak to Rusty north of Falador.solution: Rusty can be found north-east of Falador on the way to the Mind altar.

Speak to Sarah at Falador farm..solution: Talk to Sarah at Falador farm, north of Port Sarim.

Speak to Sir Kay in Camelot Castle..solution: Sir Kay can be found in the courtyard at Camelot Castle.

Speak to the bartender of the Blue Moon.solution: Talk to the bartender in Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.

Speak to the Lady of the Lake..solution: Talk to the Lady of the Lake in Taverley.

Speak to the staff of Sinclair mansion..solution: Speak to Louisa, on the ground floor, found at the Sinclair Mansion.

Speak to Ulizius..solution: Ulizius is the monk who guards the gate into Mort Myre Swamp.

Stop crying! Talk to the head..solution: Talk to the Head mourner in the Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne. Starting Mourning's Ends Part I is required. Bring mourner gear, unless the player has a slayer ring, in which they can teleport to dark beasts and head east towards the headquarters.

Strength potions with red spiders' eggs?.solution: Talk to Apothecary in South-western Varrock. (The) Apothecary is just north-west of the Varrock Swordshop.

Surprising? I bet he is....solution: Talk to Sir Prysin in Varrock Palace.

Surround my bones in fire, ontop the woo.solution: Kill a confused barbarian or lost barbarian within the Ancient Cavern to receive mangled bones. Construct a pyre ship and burn the bones onto the pyre with logs, a tinderbox, and an axe. Kill the ferocious barbarian spirit that spawns to receive the next clue.

Surrounded by white walls and gems..solution: Talk to Herquin, the gem store owner in Falador.

Surviving..solution: Talk to Sir Vyvin on the 3rd floor of Falador Castle (east side).

Talk to a party-goer in Falador..solution: Lucy is the bartender on the 2nd floor of the Party Room.

Talk to Ambassador Spanfipple in the Whi.solution: Ambassador Spanfipple can be found roaming on the 2nd floor of the White Knights' Castle.

Talk to Cassie in Falador..solution: Cassie is found just south-east of the northern Falador gate.

Talk to Ermin..solution: Ermin can be found on the 2nd floor of the tree house south-east of the Gnome Agility Course.

Talk to the barber in the Falador barber.solution: The Hairdresser can be found in the barber shop, north of the west Falador bank.

Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Ancho.solution: The Rusty Anchor is located in the north of Port Sarim.

Talk to the Doomsayer..solution: Doomsayer can be found just north of Lumbridge Castle entrance.

Talk to the mother of a basement dwellin.solution: Evil Dave's mother, Doris, is located in the house west of Edgeville bank.

Talk to the Squire in the White Knights'.solution: The Squire is located in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle.

Talk to Zeke in Al Kharid..solution: Zeke is the owner of the Zeke's Superior scimitar shop in Al Kharid.

Thanks, Grandma!.solution: Tynan can be found in the north-east corner of Port Piscarilius.

The beasts retreat, for their Queen is g.solution: (Requires full completion of the Swan Song quest. (There is no need to accept the reward though!) Dig in front of the small furnace in the Piscatoris Fishing Colony.

The beasts to my east snap claws and tai.solution: Dig by the torch in the Ardougne Zoo, between the penguins and the scorpions.

The cheapest water for miles around, but.solution: Search the crates in the General Store tent in the Bandit Camp, south of the Bedabin Camp.

The dead, red dragon watches over this c.solution: Search the chest underneath the Red Dragon's head in the Exam Centre. Kill a MALE barbarian in Barbarian Village or Barbarian Outpost to receive the key.

The effects of this fire are magnified..solution: Dig by the fire beside Ket'sal K'uk in the westernmost part of the Kebos Swamp.

The far north eastern corner where 1 of.solution: Dig on the northeastern-most corner of the Shadow Dungeon. Bring a ring of visibility.

The hand ain't listening..solution: Talk to The Face located by the manhole just north of the Port Sarim fishing shop.

The King's magic won't be wasted by me..solution: Talk to the Guardian mummy inside the Pyramid Plunder minigame in Sophanem. Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper is required.

The magic of 4 colours, an early experie.solution: Speak to Wizard Mizgog at the top of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor.

The mother of the reptilian sacrifice..solution: Talk to Zul-Cheray in a house near the sacrificial boat at Zul-Andra.

The treasure is buried in a small buildi.solution: It's in the western building at the Rag and Bone Man's site near the limestone quarry east of Varrock. Dig south of the box of bones in the smaller building.

There is no 'worthier' lord..solution: Speak to Lord Iorwerth in the Elf Campelven camp near Prifddinas. He will give you a puzzle box to solve.

THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!!! But they were her.solution: Dig at Barbarian Village, next to the Stronghold of Security.

This aviator is at the peak of his profe.solution: Captain Bleemadge, the gnome glider pilot, is found at the top of White Wolf Mountain.

This crate holds a better reward than a.solution: Inside the Ranging Guild. Search the crate behind the northern most building.

This crate is mine, all mine, even if it.solution: Center of Desert Mining Camp. Search the crates. Requires the metal key from The Tourist Trap to enter.

This place sure is a mess..solution: Ewesey is located in the Hosidius mess hall.

This village has a problem with cartload.solution: Search the bookcase by the doorway of the building just south-east of the Shilo Village Gem Mine.

Three rule below and three sit at top. C.solution: Dig in front of the entrance to the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

Try not to step on any aquatic nasties w.solution: Search the crate in Bailey's house on the Fishing Platform.

Under a giant robotic bird that cannot f.solution: Dig next to the terrorbird display in the south exhibit of Varrock Museum's basement.

Varrock is where I reside, not the land.solution: Talk to Gypsy Aris, west of Varrock Square.

W marks the spot..solution: Dig in the middle of the Warriors' Guild entrance hall. To enter, a player must have their Attack and Strength levels add up to a total of 130 or have either one equal to 99.

When no weapons are at hand, then is the.solution: On Entrana, search the southern drawer in the house with the cooking range on the western side of the island.

When you get tired of fighting, go deep,.solution: Go to Yanille Agility dungeon and fall into the place with the poison spiders, either by repeatedly walking across the balancing ledge (level 40 Agility required) or praying at the altar of Zamorak. Search the crate by the stairs leading up.

Where safe to speak, the man who offers.solution: Speak to the Mage of Zamorak in the Zamorakian chapel south of Aubury's Rune Shop in East Varrock while wearing three items aligned to Zamorak.

With a name like that, you'd expect a li.solution: Speak to Daga on Ape Atoll.

You have all of the elements available t.solution: Requirements: Started Elemental Workshop. Search the crate, just west of the Air elementals, inside the Elemental Workshop. Note: A battered key is required to enter to workshop.

You might have to turn over a few stones.solution: Kill a rock crab and pick up the reward casket or clue that it drops.

You must be 100 to play with me..solution: Speak to the Veteran boat squire at Pest Control.

You were 3 and I was the 6th. Come speak.solution: Speak to Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon.

You will need to under-cook to solve thi.solution: Search the crate in the Lumbridge basement.

You'll get licked..solution: Kill a bloodveld. Mutated variants will not work.

You'll have to plug your nose if you use.solution: Kill an aberrant spectre (Deviant spectres in catacombs will NOT work!) and pick up the clue or casket that it drops.

You'll need to look for a town with a ce.solution: Search the chest by the stairs in the Varrock church, east of the Varrock palace. Kill a monk in Ardougne Monastery to obtain the key.

Always walking around the castle grounds.solution: Talk to Hans walking around Lumbridge Castle.

Buried beneath the ground, who knows whe.solution: Speak to Reldo in Varrock castle to receive a strange device, which works similarly to a Mysterious orb in X marks the spot.

In the place Duke Horacio calls home, ta.solution: Talk to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle.

In a village of barbarians, I am the one.solution: Talk to Hunding atop the tower on the east side of Barbarian Village.

Talk to Charlie the Tramp in Varrock..solution: Talk to Charlie the Tramp by the southern entrance to Varrock. He will give you a task.

I'd like to hear some music. Come and se.solution: Speak to Cecilia, who is located on the bridge in Falador Park.

Search the chest in Fred the Farmer's be.solution: Search the chest by Fred the Farmer's bed in his house north-west of Lumbridge

Search the eastern bookcase in Father Ur.solution: Father Urhney's house is found in the western end of the Lumbridge Swamp.

Search the boxes next to a chest that ne.solution: Search the boxes next to the Crystal chest.

Search the crates in Falador General sto.solution: The Falador General Store can be found by the northern entrance to the city.

Search the crate in Rommiks crafting sho.solution: The crates in Rommik's Crafty Supplies in Rimmington.

Search the single crate in Horvik's smit.solution: Horvik's Smithy is found north-east of of Varrock Square.

Talk to Ali the Leaflet Dropper north of.solution: Ali the Leaflet Dropper can be found roaming north of the Al Kharid mine.

Talk to Charles in Port Piscarilius..solution: Charles is found by Veos' ship in Port Piscarilius.

Talk to the cook in the Blue Moon Inn in.solution: The Blue Moon Inn can be found by the southern entrance to Varrock.

Talk to Morgan in his house at Draynor V.solution: Morgan can be found in the house with the Quest start map icon.

Talk to Turael in Burthorpe..solution: Turael is located in the small house east of the Toad and Chicken inn.

Talk to Wayne at Wayne's Chains in Falad.solution: Wayne's shop is found directly south of the White Knights' Castle.

Near the open desert I reside, to get pa.solution: Talk to Shantay at the Shantay Pass south of Al Kharid.
